gobblin.runtime.api

Interface JobSpecMonitor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroJobSpecKafkaJobMonitor, KafkaAvroJobMonitor, KafkaJobMonitor, SLAEventKafkaJobMonitor

    public interface JobSpecMonitor
extends Service
    Discovers jobs to execute and generates JobSpecs for each one.
